document_data.mainbody: notable '''[[Guild]]s and organizations of [[Waterdeep]]''' are listed below.

Arcane schools and practitioners.[[Blackstaff Tower]]: The home of [[Khelben Arunsun|Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun]] and [[Laeral Silverhand]] and an academy of arcane apprentices.
Arcane schools and practitioners.[[Eltorchul Academy]]: The magic school of Lord [[Thesp Eltorchul]].
Arcane schools and practitioners.[[Enclave of Red Magic]]: The [[Red Wizards of Thay]] use the Thayan Embassy in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep|Castle Ward]] to conduct their trade, via a portal to this enclave in [[Skullport]].
Arcane schools and practitioners.[[Halaster's Heirs]]: A hidden academy for dark arcanists, situated on the first level of the [[Undermountain]].
Arcane schools and practitioners.[[New Olamn]]: A [[bard]]ic education centre formed after [[Iriador Wintermist|Iriador "Garnet" Wintermist]]'s anger at the [[Harper]]s' deviance from their original ideals.
Arcane schools and practitioners.[[Watchful Order of Magists and Protecto: Originally formed to provide protection for weaker spellcasters against people opposed to magic, now serves as the largest arcane school in Waterdeep.

Criminal and underground.[[Black Boar Tribe]]: A barbaric gang in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]].
Criminal and underground.[[Bull Elk Tribe]]: A gang of primarily [[Uthgardt]] [[barbarian]]s led by Chief [[Hagar Hlutwigsson]].
Criminal and underground.[[Plague Rats]]: An elite organization of thieves and [[assassin]]s operating mainly in the Dock Ward.
Criminal and underground.[[Savants of the Dark Tide]]: A foul organization run by [[aboleth]]s deep in the [[Waterdeep/Sewers|Waterdeep sewer system]].
Criminal and underground.[[Shadow Thieves]]: The largest and most prosperous thieves' guild in [[Faerûn]].
Criminal and underground.[[Xanathar Thieves' Guild]]: Agents of The [[Xanathar]] (or "the Eye"), the most powerful [[beholder]] in Waterdeep.

Secret organizations.[[Harpers]]: An organization believing in the goodness of humankind and its allies.
Secret organizations.[[Knights of the Shield]]: An organization that exists to gather and manipulate information.
Secret organizations.[[Kraken Society]]: A secretive criminal organization dedicated to gaining information.
Secret organizations.[[Red Sashes]]: A vigilante group particularly active in the Dock Ward.
Secret organizations.[[Moonstars]]: A group of renegade [[Harpers]] and allies of the [[Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun |Blackstaff]].

document_data.Registered guilds:
The following guilds were active in Waterdeep prior to the Spellplague and after the [[Second Sundering]].<ref>
* [[Baker's Guild]]
* [[Carpenters', Roofers', & Plaisterers' Guild]]
* [[Cellarers' & Plumbers' Guild]]
* [[Coopers' Guild]]
* [[Council of Farmer-Grocers]]
* [[Council of Musicians, Instrument-Makers, & Choristers]]
* [[Dungsweepers' Guild]]
* [[Fellowship of Bowyers and Fletchers|Fellowship of Bowers and Fletchers]]
* [[Fellowship of Carters and Coachmen]]
* [[Fellowship of Innkeepers]]
* [[Fellowship of Salters, Packers, and Joiners]]
* [[Fishmongers' Fellowship]]
* [[Guild of Apothecaries and Physicians]]
* [[Guild of Butchers]]
* [[Guild of Chandlers and Lamplighters]]
* [[Guild of Fine Carvers]]
* [[Guild of Glassblowers, Glaziers, and Spectacle-makers]]
* [[Guild of Stonecutters, Masons, Potters, and Tile-makers]]
* [[Guild of Trusted Pewterers and Casters]]
* [[Guild of Watermen]]
* [[Jesters' Guild]]
* [[Jewelers' Guild]]
* [[Launderers' Guild]]
* [[League of Basket-makers and Wickerworkers]]
* [[League of Skinners and Tanners]]
* [[Loyal Order of Street Laborers]]
* [[Master Mariners' Guild]]
* [[Most Careful Order of Skilled Smiths and Metalforgers]]
* [[Most Diligent League of Sail-makers and Cordwainers]]
* [[Most Excellent Order of Weavers and Dyers]]
* [[Order of Cobblers and Corvisers]]
* [[Order of Master Shipwrights]]
* [[Order of Master Tailors, Glovers, and Mercers]]
* [[Saddlers' and Harness-makers' Guild]]
* [[Scriveners', Scribes', and Clerks' Guild]]
* [[Solemn Order of Recognized Furriers and Woolmen]]
* [[Splendid Order of Armorers, Locksmiths, and Finesmiths]]
* [[Stablemasters' and Farriers' Guild]]
* [[Stationers' Guild]]
* [[Surveyors', Map-, and Chart-makers' Guild|Surveyors', Map-makers', and Chart-makers' Guild]]
* [[Vintners', Distillers', & Brewers' Guild]]
* [[Wagon-makers' and Coach Builders' Guild]]
* [[Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors]]
* [[Wheelwrights' Guild]]
